abstract: The province of Saskatchewan could be hit by substantial revenue losses if BHP Billiton takes over Potash, according to an independent study released by the provincial government.
snippet: The province of Saskatchewan could be hit by substantial revenue losses if BHP Billiton takes over Potash, according to an independent study released by the provincial government.
lead_paragraph: The province of Saskatchewan could be hit by substantial revenue losses from a takeover of the Potash Corporation, according to an independent study released by the Canadian government on Monday, The New York Times’s Ian Austen reports from Ottawa.

headline.main: Potash Deal Could Be Costly for Canadian Province
